name: VR Tank Battlefield War: For Virtual Reality
name_original: VR Tank Battlefield War: For Virtual Reality
description:
LOCK AND LOAD! The evil forces have attacked our nation, threatening the entire free world! As one of the greatest military leaders on Earth, you must take action to save us all!

This game is not only about the tanks,
It combines military strategy game and shooting game! ! !

In this all-out modern-war strategy game, you will battle across the globe, in the sea's depths, on the ground, and in the air, following a deep solo campaign and fighting in an exciting multiplayer mode.

Fight for your honor in epic, explosive tank battles
Your task is not only to survive in the battle but to control the plane and eliminate enemies.
As the level progress, your task will become more and more difficult. In this game the you will get to test many of your skills like driving, shooting and flying plane.

So download this tank war game and have fun !
